doc: We've recently started getting this error a lot:
error An unexpected error occurred: "https://registry.yarnpkg.com/autoprefixer/-/autoprefixer-7.1.3.tgz: connect ECONNREFUSED
We first got it in Travis ([here](https://travis-ci.org/canonical-websites/snapcraft.io/builds/309427166)).
Although it doesn't seem to happen in Travis any more, and we've never seen it when running Yarn locally, it's now happening consistently in our Jenkins jobs.
Do you have any idea what  might be causing it?
